titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 4352) to amend the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to extend programs providing urgently needed assistance for the homeless, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-813.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 331 - 81 (Record Vote No: 255).

bill.summary: 8/2/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4352 (homeless assistance programs).
